== Sanvorcem (626824) ==
      
Sanvorcem is a village in the [[Satari]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 234.74 hectares and harbouring 105 households with total population of 495 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[VALPOI]] is at a distance of 5 km. Male population is 262 and female population is 233. Scheduled Caste Population is 0 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 626824<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Total literate population: 399
* Literate male population: 220 (83.97%)
* Literate female population: 179 (76.82%)
